title: League of Legends | Live Community event & OPL Grand Final @ Luna Park Q&A

embed.description: The OPL Grand Final is coming to Sydney's Luna Park! Reserve one of the 1,300 seats and be there live! Show Your Support Cheer for your favourites and feel the chills of those awe-inspiring moments. Meet the Pros Pro players and casters will be on hand for signings, photos and Q&As.

body:
Hey everyone,

As you may have seen, we just announced our plans for the OPL Grand Final. The event will mark the first ever standalone esports event for Riot in the region. There will be a full day packed with community activities in the park, ranging from cosplay competitions and workshops to themed games and panels and then the live OPL Grand Final.
 
At the bottom of the [website ](http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/oplfinals-2015/)there are already some F.A.Q. but if you have questions that are not answered there, feel free to post them here and the team and I will try to reply as much as we can without spoiling too much the surprise! 
 
Hope to see you @ Luna Park or if you cannot make it to Sydney, to one of the HOYTS Cinema across Oceania that are supporting the event with community activities, giveaways and streaming the games.

Mastermirkinen

replies.body:
We all know Adelaide has a HUGE League following. Bringing in some big numbers to the Worlds viewing party I helped run last year, as well as some very big tournaments.

I'm unsure if Riot are organising/able to organise an official venue for us to tune into the action of the OPL Grand Final, but if not, can I get a show of hands who would be interested in myself running a viewing party for this? If there isn't a possibility of an official Riot viewing party at a Hoyts cinema, let me know what you want to see in Adelaide and I'll try my best to make it happen. 

Let's go big and show everyone, not only what Adelaide can do, but what the OCE region has!

Hey man!

There isn't anything currently planned in Adelaide, but I think its a great idea to host a community viewing party there. Would be happy to help and make that happen!

Flick me an email : Maraudaur@riotgames.com and lets work something out.

i think MCG 
porbs not though not enough people to fill it
So, so, so keen for this. The worlds session last year was damn amazing, Adelaide really has some big enthusiasm :D
why hoyts, theres loads of places that would be better
The Hoyts viewing parties is something that Riot has put together as their official viewing parties around the region.

If riot ever decides to host another OPL next year or next time will it be at a different place with more seating because this time was way too hard to get and most people were unable to obtain tickets although they wanted to go. We didn't even have more than a day to confirm with parents or friends. So do you reckon that maybe next time it could be hosted at somewhere with more seating?

Hi, yes we have learnt a lot from this. Next time we will allow a lot more time between announce and sales so we can give people more warning and time to plan. In terms of seating we are shocked at how quickly we have sold out and we wish we had more seats to supply the demand. We have lots going on in the park on the day so come on down still and get involved in the fun and finals atmosphere. Hope this helps.

Thanks that helps a lot. Well, I guess that can tell you how successful League has been in OCE, Australia and NSW. Also will going to Luna Park on the day cost anything, and does checking out any of the events cost money such as the cosplay, Q & A with riot and pro players, etc?
Hey, all the LoL community activities in the park are free so come on down and take part it would be awesome to see you there.

A lot of people don't mind missing out on the actual reserved seating tickets as we can still watch from outside but a lot of us feel left out not being able to get a showbag. Would it be possible to get the showbag in any way? Maybe riot could set up a showbag store just selling showbags similar to the ones that tickets get. I'm sure many people would buy the showbag which will make both you and us happy. Also will you guys be at EB expo this year?
Hey, we wont be at EB Expo this year. We will have prizes and swag on site also, so come down and get involved.
Is the bar going to open on the night?
This is an important question.

If by "open" you mean available, yes.
If by "open" you mean free drinks, no :)

Hello Rioters,

I have a question about the package deal of buy 4 get 1 free, I understand this means you get five enter tickets for the price of four, however my question is does this include the luna park rides tickets which are an additional $25 p/ticket as in if you get the buy four get one free do you get five ride tickets for the price of four or do you have to pay for all 5 rides tickets?

Kind Regards

Blair "OronarAu" Trembath
Hi Blair, thanks for the post. When you go through the check out process you have to add the rides x 5 to your bundle. The buy 4 get 1 free is for the OPL final tickers only. Hope this helps.
Is riot not going to pax aus or is the opl finals just not longer held at pax aus?
Hi, RIOT won't be at PAX this year as we are focused on creating a dedicated LoL event that also encompasses the OPL Grand Final and Sydney's Luna Park.
Are there going to be any HOYTS viewing parties in Sydney?
We are working on that at the moment, stay tuned for updates. Thanks.
I'm pretty sure that would be awesome, could you please post a thread if you end up making a sydney viewing party at hoyts :D thanks

Hey Riot me again so i found out that you can still participate in your activities on the day without needing to purchase a ticket for OCE Finals
I noticed that you can enter  luna park for free on the Luna park website page
But what im not so sure about is 
Do you have to purchase the Luna park ride pass on the day to participate in your activities?
Or can you just enter and participate in your activities for free without needing to pay for the Ride pass ticket or the OCE Finals ticket.
(Just double checking <3)

Hey Eyepatched Ghoul, yes our community events are free. Come down to the park from 11.00am and we will have the community activities running. You can then watch the final on screens in the park if you wish. We hope you can come down.

Hey dudes, 

Just curious, people who attend the Hoyts viewing parties, do they also get a similar showbag to the Sydney event?
Also, any chance of a pop-up merch booth on the day? I'm looking at taking my younger brother for his birthday and was hoping to maybe pick something up the commemorate the day. 

Thanks, love your work,
Kal {{summoner:31}}
Hey the merch stand is open to anyone in the park on the 8th August so come down and take part in some community activities and then grab your merch.

Hey Rioters! I just wanted to ask, I see all the tickets are sold out... I got home super late and was notified by my friend that this was happening so close to me! But yeah, all the tickets were sold out. From what I've read so far I understand that you can just go to Luna Park on the day and you can get most of the experience and what not. Is there a way I can get a Luna Park ticket and get all the stuff that comes included with Riot's version of the ticket? Like the show bag, shirt and skin code? If so would you please be able to notify me! Don't mind paying more than the $15 it normally is, I just want us to have the whole experience!

Thanks a ton in advance! <3

Hi Poonfingers, we have lots going on in the park on the day within the community areas and these are free to come and visit. In terms of the show bag thats for ticket holders only. Come on down and get involved it would be great to see you.

> [{quoted}](name=GeneralCoxy,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=w4RGfI8N,comment-id=00160000,timestamp=2015-05-04T12:07:07.257+0000)
>
> Hi Poonfingers (love the name), we have lots going on in the park on the day within the community areas and these are free to come and visit. In terms of the show bag thats for ticket holders only. Come on down and get involved it would be great to see you.

Hey man, thanks for the information! Haha thanks for loving the name and not reporting it :). Legit nickname in real life :p. And thanks for letting me know that more tickets will go on sale! I'll be sitting in front of my PC waiting to get 3 of those bad boys!! P.S you guys that work at Riot don't get enough credit for the effort that you put in. I really do appreciate you taking the time out of your day and letting me know all this information. Hope you have an excellent day/night. :)
No worries I hope you get some tickets tomorrow!
Hi, any help of recommended hotels for people who are going to travel to sydney from near by towns for the event??

That's going to be hard.
Are you familiar a little with Sydney or never been here?
If you look at the map attached, you will see that Luna Park is well connected. There are plenty of ferry from Circular Quay (in the MAP you can see it under THE ROCK) to Luna Park so any hotel in the CBD would work but also on the North Side of the bridge if on the train line (North of Sydney is not as well connected)
i know Sydney fairly well, just not good with hotels as this will be the first time travelling without parents, but i should be able to find an affordable nice one, thanks!

I'm at the shopping cart page and it seems the tickets are priced at $19.40. Even accounting for exchange rates this seems more than $15 AUD. The booking fee is listed as only $0.39 so it's not that. I'm not sure how this has worked out to be that much more?

(I'm in New Zealand)
What skin do you get from the showbag?
We haven't announced that yet. (we are still unsure).
It is at Luna Park... clearly a Shaco skin :D
Its a Diana Skin..

What's the deal with names on the OPL tickets and not being the person named? My partner and I were going to go together but now he can't go. However he purchased the tickets in his name so how do I go about still being able to use the ticket? Asking because there was something about needing ID to get into the tent with the tickets. We did email Riot Support but have heard nothing back. Help? D:
Will you guy coming to Melbourne again?
Hey sorry for the late reply. Nothing to announce just yet on up and coming events.
Hi will the merchandise store have plushies? Or it's just limited to figurines and tshirts for now?
Yes, the plan is to have plushies as well.
Awesome man, thanks for the reply.
